name: Go Morse Go! Arcade Edition
description: Telegraph cheerleading for 1-4 players! Team up or face off, hyping up the crowd by shouting letters via Morse Code.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 Ghz, single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP or better Processor: (2.0 Ghz, single core) or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
